title: Storecupboard BBQ sauce
ingredients: ['1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed and chopped', '1 red chilli, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons English mustard', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon ketchup']
